about: In today's fast-changing job market, AI skills are no longer optional—they're essential. This masterclass will teach you how to leverage AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and more to future-proof your career.

Transform Your Daily Work: Learn how to use AI to write emails in seconds, create professional presentations, analyze data without Excel formulas, and draft reports. Stop spending hours on repetitive tasks and start focusing on what really matters.
No Technical Knowledge Required: You don't need to be a programmer or tech expert. We'll teach you simple, practical ways to use AI that anyone can understand and apply immediately.

instructor.name: Rupesh Ahuja
instructor.bio: With 4+ years of industry expertise and 100+ webinars conducted, Rupesh Ahuja is a seasoned AI and career growth specialist who delivers real, actionable results.
